title: Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel Offers Special Package For Extraordinary Events In 2016
text:
Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel
One of the premier hotels near Palm Springs Convention Center incentivizes meeting planners with unique group booking offer
PALM SPRINGS, Calif. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Specializing in conferences, conventions and celebrations, Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel is offering an Extraordinary Events in Palm Springs package to complement its spacious meeting venues and premier planning services.
Helping companies and special groups meet their event budget requirements, the hotel is promoting a special offer with the following features:
One complimentary guest room per 40 booked, calculated cumulatively 10 percent discount on food and beverage Double Marriott Rewards event points Complimentary Internet access in guest rooms and meeting rooms Platinum Elite Status awarded to meeting planner (valid for one year) For planners and their groups to receive the benefits of this exclusive offer, bookings must take place before December 31, 2015 . Once booked, the hotel's professional planning team is on hand to make sure each event fits the unique needs of every group.
Attached to the Palm Springs Convention Center, the hotel is positioned in the heart of the city and boasts an inspiring mountain backdrop. With over 30,000 square feet of sophisticated event space across 15 flexible venues, meeting planners can choose the ideal location for their next group gathering. From the Grand Ballroom and outdoor courtyard to small breakout rooms and boardrooms, the hotel can accommodate a wide range of events. Additional meeting services include customized catering and on-site audiovisual equipment rental.
When meetings conclude, guests can unwind in cozy guest rooms with chic decor and thoughtful amenities. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available in all guest accommodations, and event attendees can stay entertained with their favorite shows and movies on flat-panel TVs with premium channels. Other hotel highlights include luxurious bedding, compact refrigerators and workspaces with large desks and ergonomic chairs.
After a peaceful night's sleep, guests can fuel up in the mornings at Date, the hotel's on-site restaurant. Serving Renaissance signature dishes like classic eggs Benedict with hollandaise sauce and upside-down apple pancakes, the restaurant is the perfect place to start the day. Date is also open for lunch and dinner, and after hours, travelers can gather over refreshing cocktails at Rocks, the hotel's trendy bar and lounge with indoor and outdoor seating spaces.
For details about the Extraordinary Events in Palm Springs package or to book guest rooms and meeting space now, contact the hotel's sales department at salesinfopsr@remingtonhotels.com and reference this offer. The deal is valid for all new groups arriving in 2016, and all contracts must be signed by the end of the 2015. This promotion is subject to availability.
About Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel
Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel at 888 Tahquitz Canyon Way in Palm Springs, California is attached to the Palm Springs Convention Center and minutes from the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway and the Living Desert Zoo & Gardens. The hotel features 5 floors with 255 rooms, 155 suites and 15 meeting rooms totaling 30,000 square feet of event space. Other highlights include an on-site restaurant, bar and lounge as well as a state-of-the-art fitness center and outdoor heated pool. Complimentary wireless Internet is provided in all guest rooms, suites and public areas. For information, visit www.marriott.com/PSPBR or call 1-760-322-6000.
